# Input parameters

```{r input-parameters}
params
if (!dir.exists(params[['outdir']])) {
   dir.create(params[['outdir']], recursive = T)
}
save(params, file=file.path(params$outdir,"params.RData"))
```

# Read repertoire

```{r}
# Libraries
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("enchantr"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("DT"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("dplyr"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("airr"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("alakazam"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("shazam"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("plotly"))
```

```{r}
input_files <- strsplit(params[['input']],",")[[1]]

# Check input files exist
sapply(input_files, function(x) {
   missing_files <- c()
   if (!file.exists(x)) {
      e <- (paste0("File ", basename(x), " doesn't exist."))
      missing_files <- append(missing_files, e)
   }
   if (length(missing_files)>0) {
     stop("File(s) not found:\n", paste("-",missing_files, collapse="\n")) 
   }
   NULL
})

# Load repertoire file(s)
db <- bind_rows(lapply(input_files,read_rearrangement))
```

eetable(summary, "Number of input sequences and flagged sequences per input sample.")
